_header: When that this Cock lo here doth sing
Note: Translating French, ‘Quant ce quoc icy chantera / Le roy troue ca entrera’ which precedes it; cf. 6434.
Subjects: prophecies, political; chronicles, verses in; Flemish insurrection; Philip VI, king of France
_description: Verses in Fabian’s Chronicle — one couplet

HarEng766.Transcription:
Whan that this Cokk loo here doth syngThen shall this sound King his
                    hoost inbring
HarEng766.Note: Translates French verse couplet at top of f. 228.
